long_description: Steer your skis through untracked powder snow with the rugged Madshus Glittertind BC backcountry touring boots. Waterproof, breathable MemBrain(R) soft-shell uppers keep moisture out of the boots. Light Thinsulate(TM) polyester insulation helps keep your feet warm on cold days. Hinged cuffs provide excellent ankle support without limiting range of motion. Boots have a forgiving fit that accommodates wide and narrow feet. Polyurethane rands stand up to abrasion; TPU toe and heel caps are rigid to provide protection during off-trail adventures. NNN BC outsoles provide good traction while walking; compatible with NNN BC bindings (sold separately).
